data.actual_result: The tooltip is top-anchored and does not wrap
data.expected_result: The tooltip should be completely visible and readable
data.short_description: Tooltip for roles cut off in some instances
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel - Start typing a role name - Notice the tooltip beside the role name - Note: can only replicate on the role in image, shorter or longer roles weren't having same affect)
